title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates continuity with established architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates continuity with established architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates continuity with established architectural traditions.

title: Task 2: Explain how a work demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates change from established architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates change from established architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the Hagia Sophia demonstrates change from established architectural traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain why a work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the historical context of the Hagia Sophia influenced decisions to reference or deviate from earlier traditions of religious architecture.

The response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the historical context of the Hagia Sophia influenced decisions to reference or deviate from earlier traditions of religious architecture.

The response accurately uses TWO examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the historical context of the Hagia Sophia influenced decisions to reference or deviate from earlier traditions of religious architecture.
